location.content:
Please identify the "Location" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Rosati did not say whether the payment in 1970s was part of the 1949 agreement between Warsaw and Switzerland on compensation to Swiss citizens whose assets were seized by the Soviet-imposed communists authorities after World War Two .

Let's think step by step.

1. Warsaw: The capital city of Poland.
2. 1949 agreement: An agreement that was made in the year 1949. The location is not explicitly stated, but it can be inferred that it was likely made between Warsaw (Poland) and Switzerland.

Therefore, the location entities in the paragraph are:
1. Warsaw
2. 1949 agreement (implied to be between Warsaw and Switzerland)
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Location.

1. Warsaw

The location entity in the paragraph is:
1. Warsaw

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Location".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Rosati did not say whether the payment in 1970s was part of the 1949 agreement between Warsaw and Switzerland on compensation to Swiss citizens whose assets were seized by the Soviet-imposed communists authorities after World War Two .

Let's think step by step.

1. Warsaw: This is a city in Poland and the capital city of Poland. However, in this context, it is being used as a shorthand reference to the Polish government or the Polish state. Therefore, it can be considered an organization.
2. Switzerland: This is a country in Europe. In this context, it is being used as a reference to the Swiss government or the Swiss state. Therefore, it can also be considered an organization.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.

1. Polish government or Polish state (Warsaw)
2. Swiss government or Swiss state (Switzerland)

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Organization".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Organization |
| --- |
| Polish government or Polish state (Warsaw) |
| Swiss government or Swiss state (Switzerland) |
